name: Window Pain
description:
Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/window-pain

Move, jump, and slam your opponent to claim dominion over the multiverse!
Your movements are transmitted to your growing army in real time.

The multiverse is scrambled, but the connections remain intact. look for matching edges to travel between locations.

player one: WASD or controller 1
player two: arrow keys or controller 2
